# hazardTrackingModeTracked

**Type Property**

An option that instructs Metal to apply safeguards for a resource at runtime to avoid memory hazards for the applicable commands.

## Declaration

```swift
static var hazardTrackingModeTracked: MTLResourceOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHazardTrackingMode/tracked].

## Specifying hazard tracking

- **hazardTrackingModeUntracked**: A resource option that instructs Metal to ignore memory hazards for a resource at runtime.
